sentences.english: Based in Crewe, England, Bentley is also getting ready to launch a sports car.
sentences.chinese: 總部在英國克魯郡的賓利汽車還準備推出一款跑車。

sentences.english: Penley's style is based on the harmony of oak and fruit.
sentences.chinese: 賓利葡萄酒的風格是基於橡木與果實的和諧性。

sentences.english: And amongst his friends, Hummers are common, and even Bentleys.
sentences.chinese: 而在朋友中悍馬是很常見，開賓利的也有。

sentences.english: The dials can be painted only in the original exterior colors Bentley.
sentences.chinese: 刻度盤只能塗上賓利原來外部的顏色。

sentences.english: This car had to tell the world that Bentley is back.
sentences.chinese: 這款車向世界宣佈賓利迴歸。

sentences.english: The Bentley's headlights lit up the groves of overgrown rhododen?drons that lined the drive.
sentences.chinese: 賓利車的車燈照亮了道路兩旁的牡丹花。

sentences.english: Bentley at the luxury end; plus various commercial-vehicle brands.
sentences.chinese: 高端豪車裏有賓利，外加諸多商務車品牌。

sentences.english: Ritchie had to adapt quickly and the prospect of keeping David Bentley quiet was daunting enough.
sentences.chinese: 德萊特必須適應快節奏的比賽，他很好的防住了賓利。

definition: racing bicycle/sporting bicycle/sports car/logging truck/on the job (of a train conductor)
supercar/abbr. to 超跑|超跑[chao1 pao3]
one's own car (or motorbike)/vehicle for one's private use
enclosed carriage for carrying passengers/motor carriage/car or bus/limousine/CL:部[bu4],輛|辆[liang4]
Taiwan equivalent of 奔馳|奔驰[Ben1 chi2]
